# [Interview #991: Brandon Sanderson's Blog: A MEMORY OF LIGHT ebook + Updates, Entry #1](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=991#1)

#### Brandon Sanderson

A few random pieces of catch-up news for today. The ebook for
*A Memory of Light*
came out this week, if you didn't notice. You can find it at the usual vendors.
